happiness_score.description: The happiness score of the country, measured on a scale.

gdp_per_capita.description: The Gross Domestic Product per capita of the country.

family.description: The measure of family support in the country.

health.description: The measure of health level in the country.

freedom.description: The measure of freedom level in the country.

generosity.description: The measure of generosity level in the country.

government_trust.description: The measure of trust in government in the country.

dystopia_residual.description: The Dystopia Residual metric of the country.

continent.description: The continent where the country is located.

value_dict.Europe: The country is located in Europe.
value_dict.North America: The country is located in North America.
value_dict.Australia: The country is located in Australia.

value_dict.South America: The country is located in South America.
value_dict.Africa: The country is located in Africa.

social_support.description: The measure of social support in the country.

cpi_score.description: The Corruption Perceptions Index (CPI) score of the country.
